content: Hi, I'm planning a business trip to Tokyo next week. Can you help me find a good hotel in the city?
Tokyo has many great hotels. What's your budget for the trip?
I'm looking to spend around $150 per night. Can you recommend some options within that range?
One option is the Tokyo Marriott Hotel. It's a bit on the pricier side, but it's highly rated and has great views of the city.
